by the good looks.

When you walked in,
I'm like, really attracted
to what you have going on. But then...

But then you were like,
"Her personality sucks."

No, I'm saying I need to get
to know your personality

for you to be someone I would be willing
to give up what I have going on.
Exactly, no, definitely.

The conversation with Johnny
was, like, smooth, and, like,
flirty and cute, and not too much.
And very honest.

So I think he's definitely open
to getting to know me.

[Johnny] I don't want to see that
go down the drain

just for something, like,
initial sexual attraction,
and physical attraction.
So you're attracted to me?

-[laughs] I mean...
-I'm just playing.
[Matthew] Oh! Johnny's got game.

p.span: Too bad Tre is about to intercept
by making a pass in five, four,

div.p:
[Tre]
My bad to interrupt your conversation.
Can I pull you for a second?

-Of course.
-You serious, bro?

Things were going well, but then Justine
threw that curveball at me,

basically telling me I should explore
my options, specifically with Lauren,

so it changed
my thought process immediately.

So what's something
I wouldn't guess about you?
[Lauren] I was born dead.
Wait, what?

Yes, I was born with the umbilical cord
wrapped around my neck
so I was dead.

-So you're a blessing in disguise.
-Yeah.

-You got nice eyes.
-Do I?

-You know you do.
-Thank you.
No, I don't know I do.

You say I know all these things,
I don't know.

-I guess I'm here to remind you.
-Thank you.
If Lauren does show interest in me, then

it will be kind of hard
to stay with Justine.

At the end of the day,
I just want to be happy.

Like, I just want to be wanted.
I just want to be happy.

[Tre] What was
your first impression of me?
[Lauren] Game player.
I was like, "Oh, my God."

Like, how many girls is this boy
going to try to kiss,
for God's sake?

-It was only two.
-It felt like 200.
Oh, my God.

He was a lot different
than I thought he'd be.

I saw a different side of him
I didn't think I was going to see.
Okay. I feel the vibe.

[Matthew] After each getting
some alone time with the alluring lady

p.span: from the land of the Union Jack,
the guys form a Jack's union

div.p:
It's funny, people who have talked to her
are like, "what do you think of her?"

I'm sexually attracted to her,
physically attracted to her.

Because I'm trying not to look at her,
for real.

It definitely made me feel
some kind of way
when I first saw her this morning.

I would be interested in giving
her a shot.

You know what? There are things about her
I could see myself liking.
I am physically attracted to her more.
I think we all are.

I think that if any of us out
of the six of us
should be pursuing this girl, is you,
because we're all attracted to her, sure.

But looking for someone that
could potentially be, you know,
a romantic connection, you need that, bro.

[Matthew] Johnny is maybe
almost semi-certain his head

p.span: kind of won't be totally turned by Lauren.

div.p:
I was physically attracted to her,
but that's not enough

to leave you or to even consider
leaving you.
I just-- I just don't want that.

You know, even if she pulls me
on a date or something, like,
yeah, she's cool, or whatever.
She's definitely easy to talk to.
But she's not you.
You're so cute.

I'm just saying, like,
don't worry about any of that.
Okay.
[Johnny] Cely is a real confident girl.

She's not intimidated,
and if she is, she's not showing it.
And I think that's very attractive for me.

I'm going to take a shower,
and I'll see you later tonight.

-Thanks, Johnny boo.
-One more.
[Johnny] Give me a kiss.
[soft music]

-I feel you look like Cleopatra.
-God, yes.
So hot.

Does anybody here hope
that the night ends with them
getting a kiss with Lauren?
[laughter]

p.span: ♪ Something's going to go down tonight ♪

div.p:
Do you think so?
Everybody keeps saying that.
Everybody is like, something's happening.

-Something's happening."
-I feel it.

-You do?
-Oh, yeah.

If you had just one, what kind of kiss
are you going to give her?
I would be like...
Damn!

[Lauren] Thank you, all for being
so lovely and welcoming
to my first night in the villa.

I'm happy to be here, and happy
to get to know everybody.
[all] Yeah!
That was good!
[ding]
Uh-oh!
I got a text!
[cheering]
[Lauren] Okay.

"Lauren, America has spoken and they want
you to go on a date with Connor.
#CheersBabes."
Drop the mic!
America! What are you doing!
It's America, not me.

-[indistinct]
-Nothing is going to happen though.
-He's not going anywhere.

-Do they hate me?
-No.

Why on earth would they vote
for somebody in a happy relationship
to go on a date with somebody?

To have to imagine Connor
on a date with somebody else
is just a terrible feeling.
I just can't even--

-[ding]
-I got another text!
[all] Oh!

"But that's not all. You must now choose
two other boys to date later tonight.

Please make your decision now.
#DealersChoice #WellAwkward."
I'm going to go with...
[music]
[Matthew] Lauren is going on a date
Uhm... I'm going to go with...
Johnny and Carrington.
[Lauren] Sorry, guys.

Obviously, Carrington being picked
is not a good feeling.
But it's also not a surprise.
[chatter]
I'm not worried. I'm irreplaceable.
Have fun!
It's not your fault.

Do I just go that way?
I'm nervous even to follow her.

Oh, my God. This girl
is going to slit my throat.

I mean, poor boy is locked
in a situation that I pity him for.
Like, for it to not even be my choice,

and for tears and everything
to be happening, is frightening.
[Connor] You have nothing to worry about.

All that matters right now
is that I'm here with you right now.

-I will always be here--
-I don't want you to go.
All right.
I don't want you to go.
[Connor] Come here.
Come here.

Babe, it's just-- it's just a date.
We're just going to sit and talk!
Do you want a second?
No, it's okay. You guys have to leave.
You have nothing to worry about.
I think I'm going to throw up.

-Oh, my God.
-[Connor] I'll be back soon, okay?
[Mackenzie] I'm going to be sick.

-Are you ready to go?
-I'm sorry, yeah. This is like...

So Mackenzie did not react
very well to this situation.
[crying]

But it is a kind of a sense
of relief to escape.

I will definitely go into
this night with, you know,
an absolutely open mind.

-I've never been on a date.
-Haven't you?

-No, this is my first date.
-This is your first date
and you've got tears?

[Matthew] As Connor and Lauren
head out for their date,

p.span: she's feeling so red, white, and blue.

div.p: [soft music]
[Justine] Mackenzie, are you okay?
No, I'm not okay!
Talk to me.
Talk to me.

I honestly would have been less upset
if she had just picked him.

But the fact we've been in
a relationship since day one,

and America would vote for him
to go with her.
Like, do they hate me that much?

[Mackenzie] I spent so much time feeling
like I was never enough for anybody.
And I just feel like...

America is trying to say
that I'm not good enough for Connor.
Don't take it as like America hates you.

Wanting to see him on a date
with another girl
when we're like falling in love?
Isn't that what you're supposed to do?

-Yeah.
-Isn't that what people want?

-We're literally doing that.
-Give me a hug.
Give me a hug.

I can't even process it.
I don't want to be here anymore.
Stop. Don't talk like that.
I thought I was such a good person.

-You are a good person.
-Why would America do this to me?
Why would they take my boyfriend?
He's not going anywhere, Mackenzie.
Why would they even want him to?

Why would they vote for him
to do that? Why?
[Matthew] Next time on Love Island...

p.span: Who's going to make a move

div.p:
[Tre] Lauren's definitely the hottest girl
that's walked through the villa.

I'm looking for somebody fun
and outgoing and honest.
Check, check, check.

So when you did walk into
the villa this morning,
you were exactly what I was looking for.
